---
name: Accessibility Issue
about: Report accessibility issues.
title: '[a11y]: '
labels: 'type: a11y'
---

## Welcome!

Thanks for taking the time to report an accessibilty issue.

Please remember to search for open issues before submitting.

### Browser ###

Which browser(s) are you experiencing the issue? Please include the browser version number.

### Affected Version ###

List the packages and versions the issue is found in.

### Assistive Technology ### 

Was this issue experienced using assistive technology such as a screen reader, magnifier, etc...? If
so, please provide details on the assistive technology.

### WCAG 2.1 Standard ###

Does this issue violate a specific WCAG 2.1 guideline?

### Description ###

Provide details on the accessibility issue you're experiencing.

### Steps to Reproduce ###

What steps will reproduce the error?
